original_text: So Peter went out with the other disciple, and they were going toward the tomb.
korean_text: 베드로와 그 다른 제자가 나가서 무덤으로 갈새

sentences.original_text: So Peter went out with the other disciple
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 베드로는 다른 제자와 함께 나갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and they were going toward the tomb.
